io.ktor.server.engine

类 ApplicationEngineEnvironmentReloading

  • io.ktor.server.engine.ApplicationEngineEnvironmentReloading
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ApplicationEngineEnvironment

    public class ApplicationEngineEnvironmentReloading
implements ApplicationEngineEnvironment

    Implements interface ApplicationEngineEnvironment by loading an Application from a folder or jar.

    watchPaths specifies substrings to match against class path entries to monitor changes in folder/jar and implements hot reloading

    另请参阅:
    interface ApplicationEngineEnvironment

        Implements interface ApplicationEngineEnvironment by loading an Application from a folder or jar.

        watchPaths specifies substrings to match against class path entries to monitor changes in folder/jar and implements hot reloading

        参数:
        connectors - Connectors that describers where and how server should listen
